title: Sportscast - October 7, 2015
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Sportscast - October 7, 2015 CBS 2 Local Sports 
Updated: Wed, Oct 07 2015, 11:03 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 7, 2015. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires 
BILL COSBY - SEXUAL ASSAULT LAWSUIT 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- First she called the police on Bill Cosby. Business News 
IMF: Up to $3 trillion in over-borrowing in emerging markets 
LIMA, Peru (AP) -- The International Monetary Fund says the biggest risks to the global economy are now in emerging markets, where private companies have racked up considerable debt amid a fifth straight year of slowing growth. 
IN THE NEWS: CYBERCRIME COSTS 
NEW YORK (AP) -- The cost of cybercrime is going up.
